name: PanasonicSmartWiFi
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
If you have any problem when you use this skill, you can contact us with email : wecare@in.panasonic.com

You can simply ask Alexa to control your Panasonic Smart WiFi products. After connecting Alexa to your products in a few simple steps:
1. Download our “Panasonic SmartWiFi” app in app market then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account);
2. Configure our devices in “Panasonic SmartWiFi” app and change appropriate name for your devices;
3. Enable “Panasonic Smart WiFi” skill on Alexa app, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
4. Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices". Wait for Echo to say “Search complete”;
5. Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
“Alexa, turn on the bedroom light.”
“Alexa, turn off the bedroom light.”
“Alexa, set the bedroom light to 50%.”
“Alexa, brighten the bedroom light to 50%.”
“Alexa, dim the bedroom light to 50%.”
"Alexa, set bedroom light to green."
"Alexa, set bedroom light to cool white."
